options.content:
graph  LR  
  subgraph  h1  ["Host 1"]
  ip{{VLAN: VLANA  -  IP: DATAPLANEIPA}}
  e(IFNAMEHOSTA)
  end
  
  e(IFNAMEHOSTA)  ----  sw1s1if[NAMEIFAIN]

  subgraph  sw1  ["Switch 1"]
  subgraph  sw1s1  ["interface  1"]
  sw1s1vlan{{VLAN:  SWITCHAINVLAN}}
  sw1s1if[NAMEIFAIN]
  end
  subgraph  sw1s2  ["interface 2"]
  sw1s2vlan{{VLAN: SWITCHAOUTVLAN}}
  sw1s2ifout[NAMEIFAOUT]
  end
  end

  subgraph  sw2  ["Switch  2"]
  subgraph  sw2s1  ["interface 1"]
  sw2s1vlan{{VLAN: SWITCHBINVLAN}}
  sw2s1if[NAMEIFBIN]
  end
  subgraph  sw2s2  ["interface 2"]
  sw2s2vlan{{VLAN: SWITCHBOUTVLAN}}
  sw2s2ifout[NAMEIFBOUT]
  end
  end
  
  sw1s2ifout[NAMEIFAOUT]  ----  sw2s1if[NAMEIFBIN]
  sw2s2ifout[NAMEIFBOUT]  ----  e2(IFNAMEHOSTB)
  
  subgraph  h2  ["Host 2"]
  ip2{{VLAN: VLANB  -  IP: DATAPLANEIPB}}  
  e2(IFNAMEHOSTB)
  end

```
node name: NODENAMEA   if name: IFNAMEHOSTA   DATAPLANEIPA   IPHOSTA    Vlan: VLANA
 ```

```
Switch 1   port in: SWITCHAINCOMING   port out: SWITCHAOUTGOING   switch IP: IPSWITCHA
Switch 2   port in: SWITCHBINCOMING   port out: SWITCHBOUTGOING   switch IP: IPSWITCHB
 ```
